document_data.mainbody:
Sressa was an erinyes in service to Tasnya in the mid-late 14 century DR.
Sressa was commanded by Tasnya to watch over Elminster Aumar while he was captured by Nergal, and fetch the human if possible. An erinyes later attempted to snatch Elminster during Mystras own scouring of Avernus, accidentally shielding him from collateral damage at the cost of her own life. That erinyes may or may not have been Sressa.
